#summary Various file formats handled by EARS
#labels manual

== Query file ==

== Document-entity association file ==

Controlled by parameter `AssociationFileFormat`. 

|| *Format* || *Syntax* || *Example* || 
|| `0` (default) || `EntityID DOCNO` || ||
|| `1` || `EntityID DOCNO weight` || ||
|| `2` || `EntityAlias DOCNO` || ||
|| `3` || `EntityAlias DOCNO weight` || ||

Notes:
  * columns are separated by whitespace
  * `DOCNO` denotes the external document ID 
  * `weight` is a non-negative numeric value (integer or real)
  * when `EntityAlias` is used, an !EntityAlias-EntityID mapping needs to be provided; see [EntityRepresentation] and below

== !EntityAlias-EntityID mapping file ==
Location defined in parameter `entityAliasMapping`

Format: `EntityAlias EntityID` pairs per line, where `EntityAlias` and `EntityID` are strings that contain only non-whitespace characters.

Example:
{{{
johnsmith John_Smith
john.smith@email.com John_Smith
anotheralias John_Smith
}}}
